findings.title: Actual transferred amount may differ than expected
findings.description: Some ERC20 tokens have fees on transfer which can affect reward accounting and lead to insufficiency of liquidity for rewards in farming contracts. The deposit and withdraw functions in FarmingPool contract may work incorrectly.

findings.title: Reward tokens may be frozen in `FarmingPool`
findings.description: At the line https://github.com/1inch/farming/blob/7a007ec7784cca2899889e99e46cf06d5788a7d9/contracts/FarmingPool.sol#L48 `rewardsToken` is transferred to the balance of the contract. But there is no functionality to return tokens in case of an emergency or if not all users call the `claim()` function.
